thread.title: Nii Kormiete Doku retains seat as Greater Accra Regional FA Chairman
thread.title_full: Nii Kormiete Doku retains seat as Greater Accra Regional FA Chairman

title: Nii Kormiete Doku retains seat as Greater Accra Regional FA Chairman
text:
13:42 CET Nii Kormiete Doku retains seat as Greater Accra Regional FA Chairman By Ghana FA 
Nii Kormeite Doku has retained his position as Chairman of the Greater Accra Regional Football Association (GARFA) after winning the elections held on Monday morning. 
The incumbent RFA Chairman secured 72 votes while his contender Eugene Jarquaye had 17 votes out of the total votes cast. 
Mr. Doku will therefore represent the region on the GFA National Executive Committee for another four year term.
